title: pbe?
body: Hello guys can enyone tell me why i cannot sing in on pbe acc...  i do all on sing in and  they say me maybe is usser name or password wrong but its all ok? sry for my bad english.. ty

replies.body: Your PBE account info is not the same as your live account.  You'll want to make sure to sign up on the [PBE page](https://pbesignup.na.leagueoflegends.com/en_US/pbe) and create a new username.  Let me know if that helps!
